attributes.action: Make ilegal the parts of religious text that incite racial and religious hatred
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are parts of the Koran (and other religious books) that incite hatred. i.e in Sura 9 of the Koran, readers are instructed to kill or subjugate non believers, jews, apostates etc. If I published a book saying that Muslims should be killed this would be banned. I petition the prime minister to do the same for these books
